phase_commands_wiring.implementation: PhaseCommands.cs wired to IWorkflowOrchestrator with prompt injection
phase_commands_wiring.tests: PhaseCommandTests (including orchestrator wiring, prompt passing, exit codes)
phase_commands_wiring.notes: spec/plan/build commands invoke WorkflowOrchestrator.RunAsync with prompt when session and module are available.

root_tui_wiring.implementation: Program.cs calls UseRealTui(). RootCommandHandler resolves ITuiApplication.
root_tui_wiring.notes: UseRealTui replaces stub with TuiApplication for real CLI. Tests/headless use stub.

prompt_injection.implementation: --prompt flag wired through IWorkflowOrchestrator to IPromptBuilder contextSections, and to ITuiApplication.RunAsync for TUI pre-population
prompt_injection.notes: Headless: prompt injected via contextSections[user_prompt]. TUI: prompt passed as initialPrompt parameter.

headless_validation.implementation: ValidateHeadlessPromptAsync checks headless mode requires --prompt or active session

exit_codes.implementation: ExitCodes.Success=0, Failure=1, UserInterventionRequired=2. WasInterrupted in headless returns code 2.
exit_codes.notes: Phase commands and RootCommandHandler both return code 2 when headless + WasInterrupted.
